mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(fb.board_no)
FROM board_free fb LEFT JOIN base_board bb ON bb.board_no = fb.board_no

SELECT fb.board_no AS boardNo, fb.free_board_content AS boardContent, bb.board_title AS boardTitle, bb.board_writer AS boardWriter, bb.board_view AS boardView, bb.board_reg_date AS boardRegDate, bb.board_mod_date AS boardModDate, bb.category_board AS categoryBoard
FROM board_free fb LEFT JOIN base_board bb ON bb.board_no = fb.board_no
ORDER BY fb.board_no DESC
LIMIT #{skip}, #{size}
